r.s: The source code for the PEAR website
r.n: * Fix Bug #10360: trackbacks for non-existent packages allowed [cellog] * Fix Bug #10361: emails still bounce to pear-sys@php.net [timj] * Implement Feature #10322: Explain allowed chars in patch name [mj] * Implement Feature #10351: Don't show edit/delete links in roadmap view [mj]
